inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

on bottom edge of mount, in pencil: [(illegible) #71  (illegible) Back  no mignoud (?) -> Verdier]; on back of mount, in pencil: various notes and inscriptions
markings: LRQ at bottom edge of sheet, dry stamp: image of anchor, Lugt 2862
medium: Black and white chalk and gray wash
provenance: Chevalier de Damery, Lugt 2862 (d. c. 1803), Paris; Joseph F. Klein, New York (until 1974; sale, Sotheby's, London, October 10, 1974, no. 13, for £45, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Apollo and the Muses
